extends java.lang.Object
    TaxRateTable manager

      • getInstance

        public static TableManager getInstance()
        Get the singleton.
        返回:
        the singleton of this class.

      • getTable

        public TaxRateTable getTable()
        Get the table currently used.
        返回:
        the table currently used.

      • save

        public void save(TaxRateTable table)
        Save the table currently used to a file named after the table's year.
        参数:
        table - the table to be saved.

      • setTable

        public void setTable(TaxRateTable table,
                     int row,
                     double left,
                     double right,
                     double rate)
        Set the information of a given table
        参数:
        table - the table to be set
        row - row of the table
        left - left point of the interval
        right - right point of the interval
        rate - the rate of this row

      • completeTable

        public void completeTable(TaxRateTable table)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Complete a given table.
        参数:
        table - the table to be completed
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given table is invalid or null

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String filename)
        Load a table from a file.
        参数:
        filename - the name of the file where this method should load an object

      • createTable

        public TaxRateTable createTable(int num,
                                double exep,
                                int year)
        Create a new tax table.
        参数:
        num - the number of rows
        exep - the exemption
        year - the year when this table published
        返回:
        the new table
